p: As shown in in Table 2, the essential oils of the Plectranthus species demonstrated a noteworthy cytotoxic activity against all cancer cell lines with IC 50 values ranging between 3.88 to 7.51 μg/mL. The most promising cytotoxic results against HeLa, HepG2 and HT-29 cancer cell lines were observed with the essential oil of P. cylindraceus with IC 50 values of 3.97, 3.88 and 3.91 μg/mL, respectively which were stronger than the positive control dasatamib (Table 2).
